name: The Magic Kitty of Mindful Integration
description: one of the oldest buddhist text is the “sutra of establishing mindfulness”. It discusses the four foundations of mindfulness. Pictured here as cute little kitty paws, the four foundations of mindfulness are the categories of of our direct experience. By cultivating our focus and attention we can see ourselves as we truly are, we can see the world as it truly is. We can release all of our confusions and move through the world with grace as the cute little Buddha kitty. tamintegration.com
